text: Billy Ocean (born Leslie Sebastian Charles; 21 January 1950)Biography on his official website[ Allmusic biography - accessed January 2008] is a songwriter, recording artist and musician. He was born in Fyzabad, Trinidad to Grenadan parents. He has many hit singles. Most were put out in the 1980s. On 20 October 2010, Ocean was presented with the Lifetime Achievement Award at the MOBO Awards in London. On 29 July 2011, Ocean became a Companion of the Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts.
